content: as established without decreases until sock is instep 4 cm shorter than desired length stop working after round 6 turn next row sl1 p31 toe next row * sl1 k1 * repeat to end of row work last 2 row a total of 15 times round 1 needles 1 and 3 k until 3 sts left k2tog k1 heel turn needles 2 and 4 k1 ssk k to end of needle round 2 k all sts row 1 sl1 p18 p2tog p1 turn row 2 sl1 k7 ssk k1 turn repeat rounds 1-2 until 32 sts left then repeat only round 1 until 24 sts left knit stitches on row 3 sl1 p until 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn the needle 1 row 4 sl1 k until 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn graft toe using kitchener stitch weave in ends and block if repeat row 3-4 until all heel sts are worked desired © heidi alander 2017 for personal use only photos tiina rammo www sadelmaknits com chart © heidi alander 2017 for personal use only photos tiina rammo www sadelmaknits com
